reporting-org.narrative: Environmental Centre for Oil Spills and Gas Flaring (NACGOND)

title.narrative: Sustained Media Advocacy on Environmental Education in the Niger Delta Region.

description.narrative: This activity was designed to engage the audience using the radio to create awareness on environmental issues mainstreaming climate change issues in parts of the Niger Delta. Listening audience were educated on climate change peculiarities in the entire Niger Delta with focus on the need to get the state governments buy-in to climate change action for the state. Few persons called in to contribute to the Programme and commended the donors and implementing partners for the work they are doing especially in educating the audience on some salient issues on climate change and local adaptation measures suggested in the region. Series of short 15 minutes’ radio dramas series and single episodes were aired with powerful messages to the listening audience emphasizing the need for environmental education for youths and the dangers of oil theft and artisanal refining of crude in the region. The same message tune was used for the short jingles which were aired in the radio stations as well. Periodic bulk SMS were sent to our audience which includes data base of critical stakeholders gathered over the cause of our work and IEC materials which comprised of stickers were distributed to community people through our partners working in various parts of the Niger Delta.

activity-date.narrative: This activity took place on several dates starting from 13th June 2019 down to November, 2019 with some dramas and jingles scheduled to run till April, 2020.

organisation.narrative: All project inquiries are directed to the National Coordinator of NACgond who is the Project Director.

recipient-country.narrative: This activity took place in radio stations within Umuahia, Abia State and Port Harcourt, Rivers State.

sector.narrative: The media activity established key points on climate change action plan and environmental policy of Nigeria.

condition.narrative: Media advocacy programmes have established key issues around climate change action plan and environmental policy of Nigeria as well as advocating for regional response from Niger Delta States and local adaptation measures to the audience.

title.narrative: Increasing awareness has been recorded on environmental issues in the region and local adaptation measures have increasingly been communicated through media activities.

description.narrative: Increasing awareness has been recorded on environmental issues in the region and local adaptation measures have increasingly been communicated through media activities. The awareness level of the listening audience was impacted which is believed to impress upon the audience with desired change action. Similarly, legislation and policy action on mitigation and adaptation measures in the region remain something to be pursued in the future if upper level outcome is to be attained in the years to come from now onward.

title.narrative: Recorded increasing awareness level on environmental issues in the region.

description.narrative: Recorded increasing awareness level on environmental issues in the region through persistent media programmes which was targeted at communicating local adaptation measures to climate change as well as policy and legislative actions needed to improve environmental conditions in the region.
